column4: When I alt+tab, Unity restarts. Sometimes it fails and window title bars disappear, with the keyboard unusable. There are sporadic references to this on Google with no solutions. What do I do?!
I suggest maybe trying hte proprietry driver, it worked better for me than the community one, I had a 5870
Hmm, okay, I will give it a go (I have a 6850)
Yeah the proprietry drivers for ATI are still shit but ffor high end cars I think they are a bit better
